goal.ch: 透過此課程，學生可以學習到基礎固體地球科學知識與技能，有助於深造地科相關之進階課程與建立研究題目。
goal.en: To equip students with fundamental knowledge of solid Earth Sciences that is useful in pursuing advanced courses and developing research topics.

outline.ch: 此課程包括固體地球相關之主要子題，為中央研究院國際研究生學程(地球科學學程)的五大領域之一。子題計有地質學、地球物理學、地球化學等。課程的目的為學習基礎固體地球科學知識與技能，有助於深造地科相關之進階課程與建立研究題目。通過講授、實習與研討，學生將更了解地球系統的運作方式以及它們的關連性。
outline.en: This core course covers major subjects related to the geosphere, the solid part of the Earth and one of the five major disciplines of the revised TIGP-ESS curriculum. These subjects range from geology to geophysics and geochemistry, and the objective is to equip students with fundamental knowledge that is useful in pursuing advanced courses and developing research topics. Through lecture, discussion, practical sessions, and group learning, students have the opportunity to acquire understanding of individual subjects and the potential links between them.
